Name: Job Event Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the messages for job related events.

JobStarted.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has started as the `JobState` property transitions to `Starting` or `Running`.
JobStarted.Message: The job with Id '%1' has started.
ArgDescriptions: The `Id` of the job that started.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has started.

JobCompletedOK.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has completed and the `JobState` property transitioned to `Completed`.
JobCompletedOK.Message: The job with Id '%1' has completed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has completed.

JobCompletedException.Description: A job has completed with warnings or errors.
JobCompletedException.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has completed and the `JobState` property transitioned to `Exception`.
JobCompletedException.Message: The job with Id '%1' has completed with warnings or errors.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has completed with warnings or errors.

JobCancelled.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has been cancelled and the `JobState` property transitioned to `Cancelled`.
JobCancelled.Message: The job with Id '%1' has been cancelled.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has been cancelled.

JobRemoved.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has been removed.
JobRemoved.Message: The job with Id '%1' has been removed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has been removed.

JobSuspended.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has been susepended and the `JobState` property transitioned to `Suspended`, `Interrupted`, or `UserIntervention`.
JobSuspended.Message: The job with Id '%1' has been susepended.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has been susepended.

JobResumed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has resumed and the `JobState` property transitioned to `Running` from `Suspended`, `Interrupted`, or `UserIntervention`.
JobResumed.Message: The job with Id '%1' has resumed.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has resumed.

JobProgressChanged.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that a job has changed progress.
JobProgressChanged.Message: The job with Id '%1' has changed to progress %2 percent complete.
ArgDescriptions: The percent completion of the job.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the job resource that has changed progress.
This argument shall contain the percent completion of the job that has changed progress and shall be a value from 0 to 100.
